trans-unit.source: Represents an `<identityConfiguration>` element in a configuration file.
This class cannot be inherited.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IdentityConfigurationElement"></xref> class.
Gets the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Configuration.AudienceUriElementCollection"></xref> that is associated with this identity configuration element.
Corresponds to the `<audienceUris>` element that is configured under the `<identityConfiguration>` element.
The collection of audience URIs that are configured for this identity configuration element.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IdentityModelCachesElement"></xref> that is associated with this identity configuration element.
Corresponds to the `<caches>` element that is configured under the `<identityConfiguration>` element.
The element that configures the token replay cache and the session security token cache for this identity configuration element.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Configuration.X509CertificateValidationElement"></xref> that is associated with this identity configuration element.
Corresponds to the `<certificateValidation>` element that is configured under the `<identityConfiguration>` element.
The element that configures the certificate validator and its properties for this identity configuration element.
Gets or sets the claims authentication manager that is associated with this identity configuration element.
Corresponds to the `<claimsAuthenticationManager>` element that is configured under the `<identityConfiguration>` element.
A custom type element that specifies the <xref href="System.Type"></xref> of the claims authentication manager.
The type must derive from <xref href="System.Security.Claims.ClaimsAuthenticationManager"></xref>.
Gets or sets the claims authorization manager that is associated with this identity configuration element.
Corresponds to the `<claimsAuthorizationManager>` element that is configured under the `<identityConfiguration>` element.
A custom type element that specifies the <xref href="System.Type"></xref> of the claims authorization manager.
The type must derive from <xref href="System.Security.Claims.ClaimsAuthorizationManager"></xref>.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IssuerNameRegistryElement"></xref> that is associated with this identity configuration element.
Corresponds to the `<issuerNameRegistry>` element that is configured under the `<identityConfiguration>` element.
The element that configures the issuer name registry for this identity configuration element.
Gets or sets the issuer token resolver that is associated with this identity configuration element.
Corresponds to the `<issuerTokenResolver>` element that is configured under the `<identityConfiguration>` element.
The `<issuerTokenResolver>` element registers an issuer token resolver.
This can be used to resolve Issuer key identifier clauses while deserializing a SAML token.
A custom type element that specifies the <xref href="System.Type"></xref> of the issuer token resolver.
The type must derive from <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"></xref>.
Gets or sets the maximum clock skew that is configured for this identity configuration element.
Corresponds to the `maximumClockSkew` attribute of the `<identityConfiguration>` element.
Controls the maximum allowed clock skew when performing time-sensitive operations, such as validating the expiration time of a sign-in session.
The maximum clock skew.
Gets or sets the name of the identity configuration element.
Corresponds to the `name` attribute of the `<identityConfiguration>` element.
The name of the identity configuration.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to save the bootstrap context in claims identities and session security tokens created by the handlers configured in this identity collection.
Corresponds to the `saveBootStrapContext` attribute of the `<identityConfiguration>` element.
`true` to save the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.BootstrapContext"></xref>; otherwise, `false`.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenHandlerSetElementCollection"></xref> that is associated with this identity configuration element.
Corresponds to the set of `<securityTokenHandlers>` elements that are configured under the `<identityConfiguration>` element.
The identity configuration element can have multiple `<securityTokenHandlers>` elements, each of which contains settings for a collection of security token handlers.
The security token handler collections configured for this identity configuration element..
Gets or sets the service token resolver that is associated with this identity configuration element.
Corresponds to the `<serviceTokenResolver>` element that is configured under the `<identityConfiguration>` element.
The `<serviceTokenResolver>` element registers a service token resolver.
This can be used to resolve Issuer key identifier clauses while deserializing a SAML token.
A custom type element that specifies the <xref href="System.Type"></xref> of the service token resolver.
The type must derive from <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"></xref>.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Configuration.TokenReplayDetectionElement"></xref> that is associated with this identity configuration element.
Corresponds to the `<tokenReplayDetection>` element that is configured under the `<identityConfiguration>` element.
The element that specifies whether token replay detection is enabled and specifies the maximum expiration period for tokens in the token replay cache.
